abstract.p: Nortel Networks wins contract totaling 950 million pounds ($1.4 billion) to upgrade systems of Cable and Wireless PLC over 10 years; project involves integrating voice and data services over Internet on single network (S)

block.p: The Canadian fiber optics equipment maker Nortel Networks won a contract totaling 950 million [pounds] ($1.4 billion) to upgrade the systems of Cable and Wireless P.L.C. over 10 years. The project involves integrating voice and data services over the Internet on a single network. Nortel, based in Brampton, Ontario, will upgrade assets in Europe and the United States, build a new switching platform and transfer existing customers. Cable and Wireless plans to offer additional services like videoconferencing and call and message centers.
